name: foxel-media-player-plus
description: A powerful media player plugin for Foxel with audio/video playback, playlist management, lyrics support, and advanced features

scripts.build: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const fs = require('fs'); let content = fs.readFileSync('src/index.tsx', 'utf8'); content = content.replace(/const VERSION = '[^']*';/, \`const VERSION = '\${pkg.version}';\`); content = content.replace(/author: '[^']*'/, \`author: '\${pkg.author}'\`); fs.writeFileSync('src/index.tsx', content);" && esbuild src/index.tsx --bundle --format=iife --platform=browser --target=es2019 --jsx=automatic --minify --outfile=dist/plugin.js --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"'

author: Jason
